STBLKeyStringList.Text: Trick or treat... Why not both? Trick and treat!
A nip here, a tuck there... this pumpkin is perfect!
"This pumpkin carving is evocative of the great sculptors of our time." "Hmm, yes, quite."
Pumpkins are known to be vessels that aid ghosts in crossing between the plane of the living and the dead.

Within this bowl lies every sweet thing you can imagine. Chocolate rubs shoulders with sugar and caramel in a whirlwind of deliciousness. All this can be yours, but beware. Some who reach within never return. So tell me, how much do you like candy?

Remember, carving isn’t about what is there, it’s about what's not there. Beauty is found in the negative space, and only through a lack of meaning can true meaning be found. Look at it, doesn’t the hollowness point out the hollowness in your own life? Oh, wait, it’s a cat. Meow.
These tattered rags are one of the few surviving remnants of the Windenburg City Hall building, tragically lost to fire in decades prior.
Nothing screams spooky like spider webs. Creep out the corners of your rooms with these vinyl decals.
Nothing screams spooky like spider webs. Creep out the corners of your rooms with these vinyl decals.

What’s that? You think this is just a regular cookie tray? We it’s not. This is the spookiest of all cookie trays. It was handcrafted by a team of ghosts in order to create the scariest of all cookies. Use this with extreme care.
Spritely the Well-Lit Ghost brightens up your holiday with his good-natured expressions. Maybe he's grinning? Maybe he's trying to give you a scare?
Spooky the Phosphorescent Ghost brightens up your holiday with his good-natured expressions. Maybe he's full of mirth? Maybe he's filled with terror?
These ghoulish and goofy illuminated tombstones are sure to terrify and amuse your neighbors.
This lamp provides a creepy glow from pumpkins in an assortment of colored pots.
Add scary festive flair to your party with these spooky paper lanterns. Place away from flame.
Don’t be left out in the cold, get this southpaw candle holder. Wouldn't you hate to be the last one left without one?

This hand is the right hand for your wall. It will never abandon you if you decide you don’t like candles or it’s too creepy. If you don’t get it, you’ll be right back where you started, so get the right hand today!

Lord Lycan was the first born son of a prominent household. With an everyday life that most Sims only dream of. But he had a terrible secret. One he worked hard to keep hidden. A secret only revealed once in a blue moon...

Lady Sanguina grew up a creature of the streets, stuck in a state of perpetual hunger. Until the day a hooded stranger offered her a vial of a mysterious red liquid, which she gulped down greedily. From that day forth, she never went hungry again...

Despite all the power they wielded, Lord Lycan and Lady Sanguina both eventually grew lonely. That is until the night they crossed paths, each discovering the other's dark secret. They have been inseparable ever since. Even if they sometimes tend to lose their heads.
Isn't it adorable? Look at it!
A true classic in the carved pumpkin world.
Owls are splendid creatures. Why not immortalize one as a pumpkin?
Don't be concerned for this pumpkin... It will be completely fine, trust us.
This pumpkin may have seen too much. But what?
Skulls and bats and pumpkins, oh my! You'll not find a more festive footpath than this novel rug.
The ultimate spooky decoration! Turn on this light show to captivate and amaze guests with a revolving display of ghosts.
What's better than a pumpkin? A Jack O' Lantern. And what's better than a Jack O' Lantern? A Jack O' Lantern in a witch's hat!
Jazz up your buffet with this three-dimensional haunted house decoration made of crepe paper! Centerpiece includes no jazz.

This is an ordinary Jack O’ Lantern, just like the ones that you used to see when you were a kid. Even though it may look scary, remember, Jack O’ Lanterns are harmless. What? You said this is a Jill O’Lantern? Oh... Good luck.

Despite its lifelike quality, rest assured that this spider is purely robotic. Its advanced tracking systems are quite capable at accounting for multiple targets, but having been programmed in full compliance with the laws of robotics you should feel thoroughly comfortable placing it on your walls in the bedroom, bathroom, or any other room where bloodsac- er Sims - enjoy gathering.
The stench of the reaper emanates from this chair. Oh no wait, that’s just grandpa.

As I lay me down to nap
This I say
That Grim will hold me dearly
And take me away
And I will wake up in the happy emotion.

As I lay me down to nap
This I say
That Grim will hold me dearly
And take me away
And I will wake up in the happy emotion.
Skelly Bear is a plush toy whose friendship will last beyond the holiday. His crooked smile and glowing eyes will bring joy for years to come.
Stitched together from the robes of those who came from an enlightened age, what remains of this cloth protects this table’s surface with steeled resolve.
Know this: when a carpenter takes up the cloth of our lost leaders, this is a promise. Underneath lies an end table crafted from the finest mahogany with obsessive attention to the minutiae.
“Have you walked the ruins of Windenburg? Seen the destruction of our forefathers' hallowed ground? We face a mighty foe.”
A spooky knife. I mean, a spookier knife.
For scraping pumpkins, AND NOTHING ELSE!
It's a spoon. It's a bit larger than other spoons.
Unlock all carvings by reaching level 5 in the Motor Skill.
Unlock all carvings by reaching level 5 in the Handiness Skill.
Pumpkins can only be smashed if they're on the ground.
Ghosts can only wear pumpkins that are on the floor.
There is no Carving Station on the lot.
This pumpkin is the cat's meow!
A wacky pumpkin made by one with a sense for the abstract.
A pumpkin that evokes the joyful expression of childhood.
A carving of a ghost. EMF readings of this pumpkin are off the charts!
A carving of an owl; it's doubtful it will ever fly.
It seems this pumpkin isn't feeling well...
A pumpkin that has seen something that cannot be unseen.
This pumpkin seems to have a wicked plan...
That party was truly frightful! Two ghostly lamps have been placed in the household inventory in the hope of scaring up a better time next time.
Bronze Level rewards consist of two ghostly lamps.

A smashing bash! A fest of frights! Guests left gibbering in joy after the evening of mischief and delight. The household has been rewarded with a Super Llama costume that's perfect for the next party... or perhaps for just wearing around the house.
Gold Level reward unlocks the Super Llama costume.
Guests agree, this party was a treat! An eerie portrait has materialized in the household inventory... hang it with caution.
Silver Level reward consists of an eerie portrait of unknown origins.

Be the proprietor of your own Spooky Party, where costumes are de rigueur in a setting rife with frightful decor. Prepare ghoulish gastronomy to satisfy guests’ cravings while they preoccupy themselves with pumpkin carving. Those too terrified to help themselves to the Spooky Candy Bowl can always ask another partygoer for a treat… just don’t get tricked!
Sims can carve pumpkins from a Pumpkin Carving Station. Look for it in Build Mode under Activities & Skills.
Click on a Carving Station, select a carving style, then choose a pumpkin color.
Purchase a Pumpkin Carving Station from Build Mode. Look for it in the Activities & Skills Sort!
Spooky-themed food is what's on the menu!
Be prepared for a night of frights.
Host needs a refrigerator, a counter, an oven, and a carving station.
